nodes.text: The Nine Ruling Families, formerly the Ten Ruling Families, were an elite group of Chiss families that led the Chiss Ascendancy within the Unknown Regions. The Nine Ruling Families were represented in the Ascendancy's supreme political body, the Syndicure.

At least some Great Families, who were lower in the political hierarchy, sought to become part of the higher caste. The Xodlak family was formerly one of the Ten Ruling Families, but it was demoted to one of the forty Great Families, leaving only nine.

Notably, the number of Ruling Families was not fixed at nine. The Chiss had historical records of there once being as many as 12 Ruling Families, and legends of there once being only one Ruling Family.
